messages.title: A strong voice for Skipton and Ripon
messages.content: I am proud to live and watch my family grow in this wonderful constituency. I have also seen the damage this Tory Government has inflicted on our community. Services have been cut to the bone. My wife works in the health service and my children attend local schools, so I have seen first-hand the impact the cuts have had. We need real change, not just warm words.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Labour will end the Brexit nightmare
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The only way to get Brexit sorted and bring the country back together is by giving people the final say. Labour will deliver a public vote with the choice of a sensible leave deal or remain.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Labour will put schools and hospitals first
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Tory austerity years have wreaked havoc on our vital services. It is time to give them the funding they need: to provide free social care, adequate health care and an education service fit for the twenty-first century.

Labour is committed to making Britain carbon neutral by 2030. We need new affordable housing, but it must be energy efficient. We must work with farming, tourism and local businesses to provide jobs that are environment friendly.

community.content: I am proud to live and watch my family grow in this wonderful constituency. I have also seen the damage this Tory Government has inflicted on our community. Services have been cut to the bone. My wife works in the health service and my children attend local schools, so I have seen first-hand the impact the cuts have had.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am proud to live and watch my family grow in this wonderful constituency. I have also seen the damage this Tory Government has inflicted on our community. Services have been cut to the bone. My wife works in the health service and my children attend local schools, so I have seen first-hand the impact the cuts have had. We need real change, not just warm words.

endorsements.endorsement: Brian McDaid has an excellent record of campaigning locally on issues of social justice. This, coupled with his clear and principled vision for improving the lives of ordinary people in our constituency, is why he deserves your vote on December 12th.

examples: For nine years local services have been cut to the core. Our schools, hospitals and public services are struggling. Only Labour will invest fully in the services we need.
I am proud to live and watch my family grow in this wonderful constituency.
I have also seen the damage this Tory Government has inflicted on our community.
Services have been cut to the bone.
My wife works in the health service and my children attend local schools, so I have seen first-hand the impact the cuts have had.
We need real change, not just warm words.
Labour will transform Britain, invest in and protect our services, tackle the environment crisis and transform our society.

Brian McDaid has an excellent record of campaigning locally on issues of social justice. This, coupled with his clear and principled vision for improving the lives of ordinary people in our constituency, is why he deserves your vote on December 12th.
I am proud to live and watch my family grow in this wonderful constituency.
My wife works in the health service and my children attend local schools, so I have seen first-hand the impact the cuts have had.
I have also seen the damage this Tory Government has inflicted on our community.
Labour will end the Brexit nightmare.
Labour will put schools and hospitals first.
Building for a greener future.
